All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Audio
Manages audio playback for the application, including background music and sound effects.
AudioOptions
Handles the audio options in the game, including volume and sound buttons.
Baleine
 
Bateau
 
BateauSelection
The BateauSelection class handles the selection and placement of boats on a hexagonal grid.
Board
The Board class represents the game board.
Buttons
 
Buttons.UI
 
Buttons.UI.Button
 
Couleur
The Couleur enum represents different colors that can be used in the game.
Creature
 
CurrentTurn
 
DeplacerElement
The DeplacerElement class represents the game state for moving game elements.
DiceAnimation
The DiceAnimation class handles the animation of rolling dice.
Game
The main game class that initializes and manages the game components and logic.
GameOptions
The GameOptions class represents the game state for configuring game options.
GamePanel
 
GameState
The GameState enum represents the different states that the game can be in.
GameWindow
Represents the window for the game.
Hexagon
Represents a hexagon on the game board.
Hexagon.Effect
Enum representing the effect of the hexagon.
Hexagon.Type
Enum representing the type of hexagon.
ImageDealingWith
A utility class for dealing with images used in the GUI.
JouerTuile
The JouerTuile class represents the game state for playing tuiles (tiles) in the game.
KeyboardInputs
Handles keyboard inputs for the game.
LancerDe
Represents the game state for rolling the dice.
MainClass
 
Matrice
Represents a matrix of Tuile objects used in the game.
Menu
Represents the menu state of the game.
MenuButton
Represents a button used in the menu interface.
MouseInputs
Handles mouse inputs for the game.
PauseButton
Represents a button used for pausing the game.
PawnSelectionOverlay
Manages the overlay for selecting pawns.
Pion
Represents a pawn in the game.
PionSelection
Represents the state for pawn selection in the game.
Player
Represents a player in the game.
PowerBar
Manages the drawing of power icons on hexagons.
Requin
 
RetirerTuile
Represents the game state where players remove tiles from the game board.
Serpent
 
SoundButton
Represents a button used for controlling sound settings in the GUI.
State
The State class serves as a base class for different game states in the application.
StateInterface
The StateInterface defines the contract for game states in the application.
Tuile
 
TuileEffectOverlay
Represents an overlay for displaying the effects of a tile on the game board.
TuileRougeOverlay
Represents the overlay for displaying information about a red tile in the GUI.
UrmButton
Represents a button used for Urm in the GUI.
VolumeButton
Represents a button used for controlling volume settings in the GUI.
